languages.text: "Я оказалась в Темном городе, ступая по спутанным тропам из правды и лжи. И пусть истина распустилась передо мной уродливым бутоном, оцарапавшим душу шипами, я отыскала ответы на заданные вопросы". {n}Слова Ирлиэт звучат тихо, почти невесомо.{/n} "Кто вернулся из тьмы {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Паутины{/g} — уже не станет прежним. Но изменились лишь мы, а мир вокруг все так же незыблем. Эта мысль придает мне сил".

traits.locale_text: "Я оказалась в Темном Городе, ступая по спутанным тропам из правды и лжи. И пусть истина распустилась передо мной уродливым бутоном, оцарапавшим душу шипами, я отыскала ответы на заданные вопросы". {n}Слова Ирлиэт звучат тихо, почти невесомо.{/n} "Кто вернулся из тьмы {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Паутины{/g} — уже не станет прежним. Но изменились лишь мы, а мир вокруг все так же незыблем. Эта мысль придает мне сил".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "I found myself in the Dark City after following the twisted roads of truth and lies. And although the truth blossomed like an ugly bud and scratched my soul with its thorns, I did find the answers to my questions." {n}Yrliet's words fall quietly, almost weightlessly.{/n} "Those who come back from the dark of the {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g} will never be the same. But it is we who change while the surrounding world remains immanent. This thought gives me strength."
languages.original_text: "Я оказалась в Темном городе, ступая по спутанным тропам из правды и лжи. И пусть истина распустилась передо мной уродливым бутоном, оцарапавшим душу шипами, я отыскала ответы на заданные вопросы". {n}Слова Ирлиэт звучат тихо, почти невесомо.{/n} "Кто вернулся из тьмы {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Паутины{/g} — уже не станет прежним. Но изменились лишь мы, а мир вокруг все так же незыблем. Эта мысль придает мне сил".

traits.locale_text: "I ended up in the Dark City following the twisted roads of truth and lies. And although the truth blossomed like an ugly bud and scratched my soul with its thorns, I did find the answers to the questions asked." {n}Yrliet's words fall quietly, almost weightlessly.{/n} "Those who come back from the dark of the {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g} will never be the same. But it is us who change and the surrounding world remains immanent. This thought gives me strength."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

But it is we who change while the surrounding world remains immanent. This thought gives me strength."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我踏上了真相与谎言的扭曲之路，来到了黑暗之城。尽管真相像丑陋的花蕾一样绽放，它的尖刺划伤了我的灵魂，但我确实找到了那些问题的答案。” {n}伊莉耶特的话语静静地落下，几乎没有重量。{/n}“那些从{g|Encyclopedia:Webway}网道{/g}的黑暗之中回来的人，注定不再会和以前一样。不过，改变的是我们，而我们身边的世界依旧是原来的世界。每当想到这一点，我就又充满了力量。”
languages.original_text: "I found myself in the Dark City after following the twisted roads of truth and lies. And although the truth blossomed like an ugly bud and scratched my soul with its thorns, I did find the answers to my questions." {n}Yrliet's words fall quietly, almost weightlessly.{/n} "Those who come back from the dark of the {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g} will never be the same. But it is we who change while the surrounding world remains immanent. This thought gives me strength."

traits.locale_text: “我踏上了真相与谎言的扭曲之路，来到了黑暗之城。尽管真相像丑陋的花蕾一样绽放，它的尖刺划伤了我的灵魂，但我确实找到了那些问题的答案。” {n}伊莉耶特的话语静静地落下，几乎没有重量。{/n}“那些从{g|Encyclopedia:Webway}网道{/g}的黑暗之中回来的人，注定不再会和以前一样。不过，改变的是我们，而我们身边的世界依旧是原来的世界。每当想到这一点，我就又充满了力量。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "I found myself in the Dark City after following the twisted roads of truth and lies. And although the truth blossomed like an ugly bud and scratched my soul with its thorns, I did find the answers to my questions." {n}Yrliet's words fall quietly, almost weightlessly.{/n} "Those who come back from the dark of the Webway will never be the same. But it is we who change while the surrounding world remains immanent. This thought gives me strength."

languages.text: «Me encontré en la Ciudad Siniestra tras recorrer los caminos retorcidos de la verdad y la mentira. Y aunque la verdad floreció como un bulbo horrendo y arañó mi alma con sus espinas, conseguí hallar las respuestas a mis preguntas». {n}Las palabras de Yrliet son tenues, casi vaporosas.{/n} «Quienes regresan de la oscuridad de la {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Telaraña{/g} nunca son los mismos que eran cuando entraron en ella, pero somos solo nosotros los que contamos con la capacidad de cambiar. El mundo que nos rodea es inmutable. Eso me da fuerzas».
languages.original_text: "I found myself in the Dark City after following the twisted roads of truth and lies. And although the truth blossomed like an ugly bud and scratched my soul with its thorns, I did find the answers to my questions." {n}Yrliet's words fall quietly, almost weightlessly.{/n} "Those who come back from the dark of the {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g} will never be the same. But it is we who change while the surrounding world remains immanent. This thought gives me strength."

traits.locale_text: «Me encontré en la Ciudad Siniestra tras recorres los caminos retorcidos de la verdad y la mentira. Y aunque la verdad floreció como un bulbo horrendo y arañó mi alma con sus espinas, conseguí hallar las respuestas a mis preguntas». {n}Las palabras de Yrliet son tenues, casi vaporosas.{/n} «Quienes regresan de la oscuridad de la {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Telaraña{/g} nunca son los mismos que eran cuando entraron en ella, pero somos solo nosotros los que contamos con la capacidad de cambiar. El mundo que nos rodea es inmutable. Eso me da fuerzas».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「真実と嘘のねじれた道を辿った末に、我は仄暗き都にたどり着いた。真実は醜い蕾のように咲き乱れ、我の魂を棘で傷つけたが、我は自分の疑問に対する答えを見つけたのだ」{n}ユリエットの言葉は静かなもので、ほとんど重さを感じさせない。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:Webway}網辻{/g}の暗闇から戻ってきた者は、決して同じではいられない。しかし、変化するのは我らであり、周囲の世界は内在的なものなのだ。この思いが我に力を与えてくれる」
languages.original_text: "I found myself in the Dark City after following the twisted roads of truth and lies. And although the truth blossomed like an ugly bud and scratched my soul with its thorns, I did find the answers to my questions." {n}Yrliet's words fall quietly, almost weightlessly.{/n} "Those who come back from the dark of the {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g} will never be the same. But it is we who change while the surrounding world remains immanent. This thought gives me strength."

traits.locale_text: 「真実と嘘のねじれた道を辿った末に、我は仄暗き都にたどり着いた。真実は醜い蕾のように咲き乱れ、我の魂を棘で傷つけたが、我は自分の疑問に対する答えを見つけたのだ」{n}ユリエットの言葉は静かなもので、ほとんど重さを感じさせない。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:Webway}網辻{/g}の暗闇から戻ってきた者は、決して同じではいられない。しかし、変化するのは我らであり、周囲の世界は内在的なものなのだ。この思いが我に力を与えてくれる」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ich fand mich in der Dunklen Stadt wieder, nachdem ich den verschlungenen Wegen von Wahrheit und Lügen gefolgt war. Und obwohl die Wahrheit erblühte wie eine hässliche Knospe und meine Seele mit ihren Dornen zerkratzte, fand ich die Antwort auf meine Fragen." {n}Yrliet fallen leise, fast schwerelos.{/n} "Wer aus der Düsternis des {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Netzes der Tausend Tore{/g} zurückkehrt, wird nie wieder der Alte. Doch wir sind es, die uns verändern, während die Welt um uns herum bestehen bleibt. Dieser Gedanke gibt mir Kraft."
languages.original_text: "I found myself in the Dark City after following the twisted roads of truth and lies. And although the truth blossomed like an ugly bud and scratched my soul with its thorns, I did find the answers to my questions." {n}Yrliet's words fall quietly, almost weightlessly.{/n} "Those who come back from the dark of the {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g} will never be the same. But it is we who change while the surrounding world remains immanent. This thought gives me strength."

traits.locale_text: "Ich fand mich in der Dunklen Stadt wieder, nachdem ich den verschlungenen Wegen von Wahrheit und Lügen gefolgt war. Und obwohl die Wahrheit erblühte wie eine hässliche Knospe und meine Seele mit ihren Dornen zerkratzte, fand ich die Antwort auf meine Fragen." {n}Yrliet fallen leise, fast schwerelos.{/n} "Wer aus der Düsternis des {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Netzes der Tausend Tore{/g} zurückkehrt, wird nie wieder der Alte. Doch wir sind es, die uns verändern, während die Welt um uns herum bestehen bleibt. Dieser Gedanke gibt mir Kraft."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Je me suis retrouvée dans la Cité Crépusculaire en suivant les chemins sinueux de la vérité et des mensonges. Même si la fleur de la vérité a éclos devant moi dans toute sa laideur et a lacéré mon âme de ses épines, j'ai trouvé les réponses à mes questions, {n}explique Yrliet d'une voix calme et légère.{/n} Ceux qui reviennent des ténèbres de la {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Toile{/g} ne sont plus jamais les mêmes, mais ce sont eux qui changent, tandis que le monde environnant reste immuable. Je puise de la force dans cette pensée. »
languages.original_text: "I found myself in the Dark City after following the twisted roads of truth and lies. And although the truth blossomed like an ugly bud and scratched my soul with its thorns, I did find the answers to my questions." {n}Yrliet's words fall quietly, almost weightlessly.{/n} "Those who come back from the dark of the {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g} will never be the same. But it is we who change while the surrounding world remains immanent. This thought gives me strength."

traits.locale_text: « Je me suis retrouvée dans la Cité Crépusculaire en suivant les chemins sinueux de la vérité et des mensonges. Même si la fleur de la vérité a éclos devant moi dans toute sa laideur et a lacéré mon âme de ses épines, j'ai trouvé les réponses à mes questions, {n}explique Yrliet d'une voix calme et légère.{/n} Ceux qui reviennent des ténèbres de la {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Toile{/g} ne sont plus jamais les mêmes, mais ce sont eux qui changent, tandis que le monde environnant reste immuable. Je puise de la force dans cette pensée. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Hakikatin ve yalanların eğri büğrü yollarını arşınlamamın ardından kendimi Kara Şehir'de buldum. Her ne kadar hakikat, biçimsiz bir tomurcuk gibi çiçeklenerek dikenleriyle ruhumu yaralasa da sorularımın cevaplarına ulaştım." {n}Yrliet'in sözleri, neredeyse tüm ağırlığını sessizce yitiriyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Ağyol'un{/g} karanlığından geri dönenler, asla eski hâllerine dönemeyecek. Hâlbuki etrafımızdaki dünya mutlaklığını korurken asıl değişenler biziz. Bu düşünce bana güç veriyor."
languages.original_text: "I found myself in the Dark City after following the twisted roads of truth and lies. And although the truth blossomed like an ugly bud and scratched my soul with its thorns, I did find the answers to my questions." {n}Yrliet's words fall quietly, almost weightlessly.{/n} "Those who come back from the dark of the {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g} will never be the same. But it is we who change while the surrounding world remains immanent. This thought gives me strength."

Her ne kadar hakikat, biçimsiz bir tomurcuk gibi çiçeklenerek dikenleriyle ruhumu yaralasa da sorularımın cevaplarına ulaştım." {n}Yrliet'in sözleri, neredeyse tüm ağırlığını sessizce yitiriyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Ağyol{/g}'un karanlığından geri dönenler, asla eski hâllerine dönemeyecekler. Hâlbuki etrafımızdaki dünya mutlaklığını korurken asıl değişenler biziz. Bu düşünce, bana güç veriyor."
